text: Cae Pwll-y-bo is a Site of Special Scientific Interest in Brecknock, Powys, Wales. It is managed by the Brecknock Wildlife Trust and is noted for the globeflower. ==See also== *List of Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Brecknock ==References== Category:Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Brecknock
title: Cae Pwll-y-bo
